name: kingchat
description: KingChat LINE OA Customer Service Management System

scripts.dev: npm run stop && npm run backend & npm run frontend
scripts.start: npm run stop && start "Backend" cmd /k "cd server && node server.js" && timeout /t 3 /nobreak && start "Frontend" cmd /k "cd client && node frontend-server.js"
scripts.restart: npm run stop && npm run start
